description:
Easily Self Publish on Amazon Kindle is a comprehensive course designed to help you go from topic selection to publishing to promoting your book. Included in this course is a downloadable Microsoft Word formatted template that is ready to go! Simply open and start typing your book, then upload it directly to Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP).

During this course you will learn:

  • all about KDP and how to set up an account
  • choosing and completing a marketable writing project
  • how to efficiently work with your template
  • revision and editing strategies
  • how to preview your book prior to publishing on your Kindle device
  • pricing strategies
  • how to upload your book
  • about the KDP Select opt in program
  • how to promote and market your book
  • how to create a simple and stunning cover in Microsoft PowerPoint

This course is designed for writers to realize their publishing dreams! Join this course and learn how you can get your book on Amazon Kindle and into the hands of readers.
title: Kindle Formatting and Direct Publishing for Authors
